name: Super Ultimate Red Dot Shooter: The Begin Of The Begining
name_original: Super Ultimate Red Dot Shooter: The Begin Of The Begining
description:
Goal :

  • To get the highest score

Tips :

  • the game resolution is 16:9
  • you can use your skill when you loose 1 hp
  • you can adjust the sensitivity in the option

Command :

  • Mouse ( and maybe keyboard and controller)
  • Right click or Space to use the skil
  • Shift to slow down your movement speed
